page.title: 20SCHOOLS
page.content: Parkside School is a school for pupils who are Educationally Sub Normal because they suffer from varying degrees of mental handicap. The school is housed in a bright one storey building next to Primrose House which is residential hostel where some of the children live. The pupils are divided into small classes on the basis of their age and ability. The teaching staff are helped by Nursery Nurses and volunteer help from local schools. Every year, a party of the older children from the school have a holiday, sometimes abroad.The school caters for all kinds of mental disability and has a very friendly and caring atmosphere. Parents of the school are involved in the life of the school through a liovely Parent Teacher Association.
